attributes.action: Call a referendum to STOP people entering the UK illegally & receiving benefits
attributes.background: Previous Tory & Lab governments promised to stop this. WE the people have NEVER been consulted on giving them FREE accommodation, health care, benefits etc. WE the people DEMAND  a referendum to STOP any future influx and to STOP ALL BENEFITS for the 1.2 million who are already in receipt of them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711690
